analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x8aff1a0fec91cfa690fe79c1c140f5b59c56a181.sol:
	Contract MYFICHAIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x8aff1a0fec91cfa690fe79c1c140f5b59c56a181.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0x8aff1a0fec91cfa690fe79c1c140f5b59c56a181.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
